channel.title: [epicurus] Help with building server
channel.description:
so i was downloading this source http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,625602.0.html and for some odd reason i cannot run the server via Eclipse and i have no idea how to "build" the server in eclipse as the owner states i have to do
Building: The project must be built through Eclipse. The .project and .classpath files still remain, so it shouldn't be too difficult.
any help is appreciated, thanks <3
